cast.name: 小道格拉斯·范朋克 Douglas Fairbanks Jr.

awards:
第11届威尼斯电影节(1950)
　　主竞赛单元 金狮奖(提名) 西德尼·吉里亚特

writer.name: 西德尼·吉里亚特 Sidney Gilliat

director.name: 西德尼·吉里亚特 Sidney Gilliat

introduction: Visiting in England, famed American surgeon Doctor John Marlowe is decoyed to a middle European country, and discovers the operation he is to perform is on the Vosnian dictator. When the latter dies, he is replaced by a look-alike, but Marlowe is the object of a shoot-to-kill, vicious pursuit by the secret police of Vosnia since it is vital to Vosnia that the dictator's death does not become known. Fleeing, he seeks help from an English-speaking actress, Lisa Robinson, and the two are harried across the countryside before being captured.
